snippet: Apps can time a user’s exposure to the summer sun, and recommend protective clothing and sunscreen factors.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column examines applications that help users determine sunburn risks; notes Microsoft has released Video Tuner app for Windows Phone 8.1 devices, which adds basic video editing functions.
lead_paragraph: Apps can time a user’s exposure to the summer sun, and recommend protective clothing and sunscreen factors.

headline.print_headline: Your Time in the Sun, Measured to the Minute
headline.main: Your Time in the Sun, Measured to the Minute
